Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.controllers.driver_controllers module

class controllers.driver_controllers.DriverController[source]

Bases: object

Controller for driver registration and login.

static register(data)[source]

Register a new driver.

Parameters:

data (dict) – Driver details with keys: - first_name (str) - last_name (str) - age (str) - username (str) - email (str) - dob (str, optional) - gender (str) - password (str)

Returns:

(dict with message, HTTP status code)

Return type:

tuple

static login(data)[source]

Login a driver.

Parameters:

data (dict) – Driver login details with keys: - email (str) - password (str)

Returns:

(dict with message, JWT token, username, HTTP status code)

Return type:

tuple
